EmailTemplate.name: Global_Nurture_Jetwave_BGA.201706_Global_Email_Jetwave_BGA_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Is Sharing Really Caring on Your Inflight Wi-Fi? ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Manage Your Data with Honeywell’s GoDirect Services <[[https://youtu.be/Woe2pTqHPGg]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Sharing is caring, right? You love staying on top of emails, downloading movies and FaceTiming with your family, and so does everyone else onboard. Honeywell’s GoDirect Cabin Connectivity is the only offering available that puts you in control of your onboard connectivity. Want to kick your kids off the Wi-Fi? No problem. Want to restrict your guest’s consumption on the next flight? Done. With Honeywell’s support, you can use and manage your service with no surprises, or surprising costs. Have your cake and eat it too. Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/cabin-connectivity]]> about Honeywell’s equipment and services that support your connectivity needs.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
